titles.title: Providing for an exception from the limitation of clause 6(d) of rule X for the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-404, by Mr. Dreier.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 138.

action.text: On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 194 (Roll no. 633).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 195 (Roll no. 634).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/13/1997--Introduced. Authorizes the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight of the House of Representatives to have up to eight subcommittees for the duration of the 105th Congress notwithstanding the limit of seven subcommittees allowed under rule X of the Rules of the House.
